content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north bound on hwy31 just north of hwy24 came up over hill and noticed an aircraft in my direct line of sight through the windshield travelling from west to east approximately 20 to 30 miles away and at a 30 to 35 degree elevation from my veiwpoint.  at first thought it was an aircraft with landing lights on.  observed craft for approx. 10 seconds as it flew straight w to e (approx. 5-6 inches relative)then it took a 90 degree turn straight up and flared like a shooting star (approx. 2-3 inches also relative) before a final brighter burst and then disappeared.  called my fiance immediately following the event and told her of it.  hair on the back of my neck stood up during the observation.
sky was crystal clear. sun had set with little or no dusk light.  temperature was @10 derees with a wind chill of 0 to -5 degrees.  visibility was excellent.  could see other aircraft easily. 10 to 15 min after event observed 3 military aircraft in diamond formation flying in same part of sky.  i am a military vet and lived on a naval air base for over two years. i consider myself to be an educated aircraft observer.  i have never seen a craft maneuver such as this nor create lights or light streaks such as this craft did.
content.summary: Thought was aircraft with landing lights till 90 degree turn/high speed exit.

content.detailedDescription:
December 9th, 2009

 

 

ok. 

 

i saw a ufo tonight, rather, this morning. i was going for one last pee for my dog and just as i went out from my side garage door i looked upward. as i was going out, the stars on the horizon of my field of vision were so bright and clear i could already see i wanted to look at them when i stepped out. 

 

i poked my head from out of the threshold of my garage and as i looked up i saw a distinct orange streak; pulse-like, four or five dots, but very clear, then abruptly disappear. the last dots were longer than the first ones. this was not a meteorite i witnessed! it was very large and moving at an incredible rate of speed. there were clouds in the sky, but this light was not obfuscated by them in the least. 

 

orange...Pulse-like and then....Poof....Gone. meteorites and meteorite showers have a trace. we've all seen them and can watch them burn across the sky. they're beautiful and fascinating and they burn bright white. clouds will either dim or completely kill your line of sight. what i saw was bright orange and had a distinct ...Bam....Bam...Bam...Pulse....As it just whipped across the night sky. 

 

again, meteorites have a type of arc; they're somewhat predictable. what i just saw wasn't going down! it wasn't "going across!"

what i just saw was going up and out! 

it was going away from earth...At a very high rate of speed. 

 

 

again, i stress, i've been looking at the night sky for decades. i'm not an astronomer; just a regular guy who enjoys the sight of stars and the occasional meteorite. this is something i've never seen before and will never forget for the rest of my life. the memory of this was that it was most impressive and very frightening. it wasn't a meteorite. meteorites don't pulse like that and i'd really like to hear a phd. in astrophysics explain why that damn thing was bright orange! 

 

 

in all sincerity, i swear this is what i witnessed today. 

 

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Orange pulse-like object 4-5 dots streak off, not to ground but up and away!

content.detailedDescription:
First i was in a car my husband was driving and i was passenger sheat. i found somthing orange, but that was too big as helicopter and it was different light color from airplane. then the light start having white light like stage light stright to graund, and then start shooting the beams to sky like military. it was alot. but not keep on shooting. 

it was like 8 or 10 red dots comming out from that thing and go farther then come out again.

i told my husband but he said that he doesn't see the light. 

 if it was rael airplain somebody could get hurt. that much beams came out. like 8 to 10 dots came out one time and totally 3 or 4 times.

the that disapeared while i was watching. so can't be man made. i kept lookin at sky but couldn't find again. 

the white light was like exactly same kind in the movie like ufo sucking up the human.
content.summary: Had white light towards to ground and had lots of beams like shooting.

content.detailedDescription:
Good day:
i have been searching the internet in vane today looking for any reports on what i saw last night driving home from work.
i left work at around midnight dec. 9, 2009 travelling northbound on 880 in fremont california
near the mowry exit, i saw an extremely bright light in the sky. it lasted for about 1.5 seconds but, it lit up the sky as if a picture were being taken. this is so hard to explain; but i could see a pin-light from where it emanated and it seemed to be coming from the ground and fanning out to light the sky and all that was around me. the light was like a welding arch; but it lit up the sky and as far as i could see on either side of my car. as well, it seemed to be miles north of me but absolutely visible.
i turned off my radio and cracked a window to listen for any noise, like a crash or something, and there was only the road noise.
approx. 15 seconds later, the light appeared again only this time i had my radio already off and my window down. again it lasted about 1.5 seconds, lit up the sky and everything around me with a white light resembling a welding arch, and again there was no sound.
any news on this would be greatly appreciated.
content.summary: Nb on hwy. 880 near mowry exit - very bright light lit sky twice for about 1.5 seconds each

content.detailedDescription:
I wanted to test my new web cam in video mode at night.  i stepped outside my apartment near southern ave and rural road.  i took a few pics and videos of objects in the area.  

i had turned my camera off and was talking to my son when i noticed directly overhead, a bright blue light just hanging there in total silence.  it stayed there for a few moments.  long enough for my camera to reboot.  i was able to get it on video for a few seconds before it sped off and disapeared.
content.summary: Blue ufo speeds off

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed odd lights in the sky. i observed them for only about 5 minutes in all. maybe less. they could have been there much longer, i don't know.  

they were blinking quickly (not all would blink at once) amongst themselves in a predictable, synchronized pattern. they were stationary (in a group) for about 4 minutes and then softly moved off and disappeared. my daughter and i both witnessed this. the lights were small as stars, colored whitish/blue as stars. the lower level planes that were also in the sky seemed artificial and yellow compared to these ufo lights. 

the planes were definitely lower and definitely planes. these synchronized lights were something totally different. i have never seen anything like this ever! i live in a semirural area that is surrounded by urban sprawl. we have some light pollution and lots of plane traffic due to the airports around the dfw area, but we can see the stars too at times. the only reason that these lights even caught my eye in the first place was the quick, rapid firing of the light sequence. otherwise i may have not seen it. 

i don't know why i looked up in the sky, but i was out in the barn feeding my animals and my horse nudged my face. she doesn't do this ordinarily and she did it twice tonight! i just  happened to look up at that second time that she nudged me and this light pattern caught my eye. 

the lights moved off in their organized pattern and kept the "light sequence pattern" going as they gradually left the sky. they faded off in the distance slowly but they were gone in @ 30 seconds from the time that they began to move. the departure was gradual, but quick. i think that there were about 3 lights on one horizontal level, the end craft "blinked" diagonally upwards to another level, and then another  level began to blink. perhaps there were 6 in all? they seemed to be in a "stair step" pattern. 

my daughter attempted to catch them on her cell phone but she did not get any good footage.
content.summary: 6 -9 individual star-like lights that would "communicate" in a  repetive sychronized pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Ca 11 p.M., small light following close behind me as i was driving. i stopped at a gas/food mart for ca 20-30 minutes then resumed driving. again the small light was following. my brother and i stopped and got out of our car. as we approached the rear of our car, the "single" small light split into 3 lights,one above the other then all 3 darted off and out of sight.
    we continued on our way. we then saw what appeared to be a small meteor fall and hit the earth not far from our location. we stopped, got out of the car and that is when we saw a large, disc shaped ship with multiple lights.
     to make a long story short; for around 5-6 hours we saw 2 large ships which were stationary most of the time, otherwise moving very slowly. at times one seemed to be above the road and very much appeared to "lift" another vehichle up and into the darkness, at which time it and the vehichle lights were cut off.
     there were 5-6 vehiclss which were out in the feild alongside the road, (on the otherside of fence). 2 of the cars, that we know of, had an unconscience person within.
     one particular event which i thought to be quite fascinating, was one of the "mother ships", above the road in front of us and very low, (100-150 ft high), slowly flew away from us. we followed up the hill. it changed it's row of lights to one bright light on its left side & 2 lights on its right. it then flew out of sight, very slowly, over the hill. as we crested the hill, we saw the same lights on the ground ahead of us, as we approached we realized they were lights at a farm house. the ufo "tricked" us. they knew we were following and knew how to trick us with their lights.
     for 5-6 hours we drove up and down a 2-3 mile stretch of road observing these 2 large ships, 3-4 smaller ones and an unusual, small cloud full of small, vein-like lightning.
     at one point, toward the end of the event, my brother and into the dark. were standing together in front of our car, the headlights were on and in front of us about 10 feet or so were 2 umm, "aliens", or so we assume. they were probably 6 1/2 feet tall, wearing a light colored suit, one piece i guess, with a v-neck ( i think?). they slowly 'drifted' backwards away from us and into the dark. neither of us remember what we were doing prior to seeing them in front of us.
     too much occurred that night to write here. this occurred about 15 miles east of ely, nevada on july 19th, 1990. wish i would have told you about it years ago. i wrote down the experiance the following morning, just after it happened.
content.summary: 2 large (mother) ships..3-4 small ships...Stationary, small cloud w/electrical activity.

content.detailedDescription:
Where:

at the mountain "ajusco" a group of two friends were camping

what:

 sun reflections over the spheres caught our attention

what we think: ?

we first though were air ballons


description:

 15 stasionary metalic like spheres about 15 feet diameter

feelings:

surprise exitement

lose sight:

instant disaperance
content.summary: Several silver spheres over the near mountains (ajusco )in mexico city ( south west

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were in preston nevada in white pine county looking in a nearbye field for my neighbors dogs. i noticed some very vivid lights in the sky probably a good 8-12 miles north of our location. the lights were in patterns of two rows, one above the other and it seemed as if there were two different structures both in a round cylindrical shape, these structures were also positioned one above the other. the bottom of the two structures was tilted to about a 45 degree angle. they seemed to be motionless and just kind of hung there stuck. when i first saw the object i knew exactly what it was "a ufo". it was something i had never seen before and something i've never seen since. this thing/things that we saw in the sky were huge. they were miles away and you could still easily pick out each individual light (probably about 50 lights per structure.) my friend and i both sat in awe for about a minute staring at these things. i told him i was going to run to my house and get a camera and about the time i started to turn away the top structure started to slowly move to the east and dissappear, it looked as if it was moving into a hole in the sky, once the top structure was completely gone the bottom one straightend out and moved into the same "hole". we stayed out there for a good hour waiting to see if something would re-appear but it never did.
content.summary: Two cylinder shapes one hovering above the other, the bottom on was sort of cocked on its axis.

content.detailedDescription:
Question
1: i was driving home at around 3:45pm
2: i glanced at some railroad tracks, when the glow caught my eye.
3: it might have been a meteor/meteorite
4: from where i was it was a centimeter long moving at about 1cm per 1sec. it had a greenish blue glow and was elliptical. i thought it was tumbling but wasn't sure.
5: mostly "what the hell was that?" type feeling.
6: went behind trees.    

i am attaching a general area/direction of where it was and what it looked like.
content.summary: Glowing greenish blue, across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room and saw through a south facing window, fireworks going off.An orange star flew up to the fire works and stopped. the fire works were about 50 feet off the ground and the orange star looked like a plane or sattelite moving through the air at first but it came closer and it looked odd. i could not focus on the star-lite ,and rubbed my eyes, but it was still hard to focus on the light it was orange and had many many rays coming from it. the fireworks burned out and the orange star came in closer to town. the orange star came up to town from the ski mountain ssw to the north and sat for about 10 seconds,it the moved to tne east and sat and then moved to the west-about 200 feet between movements. i scrambled for the camera but was unable to find it and ran outside to continue viewing the object. there was no sound, it was close to town,about 500 feet off the ground to the south.It moved east to west very slowly a few times and then flew in a blink of an eye to the south into sky until i could not see it anymore.
 the whloe viewing lasted about one minute,i was glad to see it when i got outside, the glass, nor my eyes were playing tricks on me ,the orange star had many rays coming from it .The stars around it looked flat in comparison the the light coming from the orange star.It looked bigger than a star or planet but not too much larger and could move very fast with no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange dot or star with many rays coming from it

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my living room and saw through a south facing window, fireworks going off.An orange star flew up to the fire works and stopped. the fire works were about 50 feet off the ground and the orange star looked like a plane or sattelite moving through the air at first but it came closer and it looked odd. i could not focus on the star-lite ,and rubbed my eyes, but it was still hard to focus on the light it was orange and had many many rays coming from it. the fireworks burned out and the orange star came in closer to town. the orange star came up to town from the ski mountain ssw to the north and sat for about 10 seconds,it the moved to tne east and sat and then moved to the west-about 200 feet between movements. i scrambled for the camera but was unable to find it and ran outside to continue viewing the object. there was no sound, it was close to town,about 500 feet off the ground to the south.It moved east to west very slowly a few times and then flew in a blink of an eye to the south into sky until i could not see it anymore.
 the whloe viewing lasted about one minute,i was glad to see it when i got outside, the glass, nor my eyes were playing tricks on me ,the orange star had many rays coming from it .The stars around it looked flat in comparison the the light coming from the orange star.
content.summary: Orange dot or star with many rays coming from it

content.detailedDescription:
Let me start by saying my whole life i have lived by military or
civillan airfields. i was in the military myself and i am presently
working as an air traffic controller, a postion i ve worked at for 20+ years.I am a trained observer. in 1980 or 1981 a "news flash" reported "ufo's over ranch cordova" on the 10 pm news. i ran outside
and as i was running out the door told my mother. my mother came out with me. we lived at 2717 barbera way, right next to the cordova lanes bowling alley. we ran over to the entrance to the strip mall, next to the diner.
i started looking around. i looked toward the se (toward the rancho seco nuclear plant and mather afb)and saw a formation of 3 lights coming toward us in a triangle formation at about 1000 ft. the object flew directly over us. it emmitted no sound and the object was solid. the
appox size was about 40 ft at its biggest point. it appeared to have 
4 "bluish lights" in the rear, possibly an engine. my mother and i observed the aircraft until it dissappeared over the trees to the nw.
approx speed was about 150 mph.The sacramento bee ran a front page story on this the next day, which included a map with the flight path.
if anyone knows the exact date i would really appricaite this as i cannot remeber if it was in 1980 or 1981. the flight path took the craft over mather afb, rancho seco, mccellan afb, and beale afb.
thank you for any futher information
content.summary: Ufo's reported over ranch cordova on 10 pm news.

content.detailedDescription: Gigantic black isosceles triangle the size of a large air-craft-carrier ship flew over our neighborhood at 1,000 foot altitude and was seen by me and significant other simultaneously.  we could see lights at the apex of the angles of the triangle and these lights were a dull yellow/white; you could see the structure of the underside of the craft and it looked like a starship as you might imagine in a star wars movie script.  the craft was totally silent and moving west to east at very slow speed, estimating at perhaps 15 to 20 miles per hour.  the craft continued east for another 1/2 mile or so -- still visible because the lights of the city were illuminating the object -- and it banked to the left (north) and then took off at incredible speed, estimating at some hundreds to thousands of miles an hour instantly and disappeared into the night in the north.  we were dumb-struck by the sighting.  totally silent, huge, isosceles triangle, structure underneath, lights at apex were not colored red/green or any real color than a dull dirty yellowish.  no visible means of power; no jets, no sound, no hum... nothing.  it had to be antigravity being that huge and silent.  and the speed as it took off was simply amazing indicating it was no blimp or other terrestrial craft as it appeared to defy physics at that point; from just barely moving to like mach 10 instantly and gone.  we filed a police report at the time.  police took report and that's the last we've heard of it.  it was absolutely clearly seen and huge, silent... not from here.  i would have liked to have seen radar records from the local airport of the time in question but whoever was piloting this craft had, apparently, no concerns about being seen so i suspect the craft was not visible to radar.  there is a military base in the same general locale but this thing was nothing like i have ever seen.  i've seen b-1 and b-2 bombers, etc., and f-114a jets, etc., and this craft was not any of these.  it was not an aurora or t3ba either... it was a ship like i have never seen and was not from here as best i can determine.
content.summary: Gigantic black isosceles triangle star-ship flew over my house at 1,000 foot altitude seen by two people simultaneously.

content.detailedDescription:
While looking at the reporters photo of a news story on seacoastonline (link below), i noticed a strange shape in the photo.  directly above the fire truck in the attached photo, is a triangular shape.  there is no such shaped object in the area where this photo was taken.  i am not the taker of the photo, either, merely curious at what it could be.  i have sent an e-mail to the newspaper this morning inquiring as to whether or not this photo was photo-shopped prior to publishing.  i have not had a response as of yet.  my first thought was that the photo was a screen capture of an on-line paused video (where a triangle shows in the middle of the screen).  when i zoomed in on the photo, it does appear that the right most point of the triangle is behind the building.  
original news story and photo here: http://www.Seacoastonline.Com/articles/20091210-news-912109992
content.summary: Inadvertant siting in news photo

content.detailedDescription: June 30,2008 my father died in mississippi. my mother came to chicago after the funeral. she went to stay with my sister in harvey,il. i left my house to go  her. i'm driving down the street getting ready to get on the expressway when something caught my attention. at the time i thought that it was a blimp, because it was the time of taste of chicago in downtown chicago.It was a very clear day with regards to weather.I looked at the object and i first thought that it was a blimp. but then i thought, blimps don't fly that high. then i said it was a helicopter, helicopters don't fly that high. i said it's an airplane, but it wasn't moving. i noticed that was a silver object. at the blink of an eye, this thing dropped, i don't know how many feet, but i could really see it clearly. it was disc shaped, it looked as though it was very hot because i could see the heat coming from it.I could see spinning counterclockwise. slowly it went away from me and over the horizon behing a tree line. at the time that i saw this object i was trying to get my camera from behing the seat of my truck.I couldn't get my camera. after everything was over i had remembered that my cellphone has a camera on it. when i made over my sisters house i grabbed the phonebook ane looked up the number to channel 5 news. i called them and told them what i had just seen, but they told me that noone else had reported it. i told my mother about it and she told me that in her life she's seen many u.F.O.'s.Istill can't believe what i saw but i saw, but i saw it. i told the guys on the job about it and they told me to go take a drug test, they thought i was crazy.I've been a chicago fireman for 21 years, i'm still on the job. i thought that i had seen it all, but i guess that i haven't.
content.summary: Saw a ufo as clear as day approxiamately july 10, 2008.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness called dispatch, statement was typed up by mufon dispatch...Steve cox.

flatted disc like putting 2 plates together with a dome on top and bottom, approx. 50 foot long length of 2 foot ball field,less than 1000 feet from witness, between 11th and 15th ave closer to 11th, chased it with his charger, was looking for windows in the saucer, was going slow, like drifting heading due west. bottom dome was turning, around the outter body of the rim looked like light holes. was watching object through his sun roof. could not see lights just light holes, color of object was medium gray. didnt have a camera at the time of the sighting. continue to il.  state line.

object looked to be man made to his oppinion.

it was a sunny warm day with a few clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Saw a saucer like 2 plates put together.

content.detailedDescription:
The reason i enter this is it was very like yet not the same to the lights seen over norway last night.... i didn't think to report this till i saw the news on msnbc this morning....Unlike the video on msnbc "my" light was followed by a huge red flash...

after a band show (i am a club promoter) i watched a blue/green light in the western sky... sugar house area is on a hill in salt lake giving me a huge view of the western sky.... the blue light appeared to be coming out of the great salt lake or maybe just past it... it is hard to tell at 2 am.... of my group of 5 people i was the only one sober after the rock show... we thought it might have been lights from some desert party... but after talkin g to my raver friends the next day there were no parties to anyone's knowledge that night... at the time i thought my friend david who runs a light show had outdone himself... the blue green light went away and we saw a spiral "light show" much like the one i saw this morning on msnbc...
i do not buy the norway military saying it might have been the russians missile.... for one the russians would never test a weapon the day our us president is in norway for peace prizes!!! that was no missile and i saw no missile... i have no clue what i saw but i saw something strange in the utah western skies as did my friends... also alot of people have seen wierd stuff out that way lately...
content.summary: Large beam of light then spiral in sky over blue light area multicolored spiral

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to church, for sunday morning service.  i was driving south on us highway 15-501.  there were a few chemtrails in the sky. the weather was great, and the sun was out, so i decided to pull over to the shoulder of the highway, and my judgement was i had good angle to take pictures of chemtrails.  the clock in my car read as 10:21am. i pulled off the highway at about 1000-1500 feet past the morreene road overpass. the traffic was light, but i put my hazard lights on- anyway. the only access that i had to a digital camera was my cellular phone, and i removed the phone from my purse and activated the camera function.  my cellular phone was manufactured by sanyo, model number scp5500kit, registered for service with sprint communications.  

as my car was facing the south,and the direct path of the sun, i focused my lens on a chemtrail in the eastern portion of the sky.  on my lcd, i immediately noticed circular objects moving around on the screen, particularly one surrounded by pink light. i knew instantly, that these were probably spacecraft, so i snapped my camera shutter a few times as quickly as i could. i viewed these pictures several times.   

after about a minute or so, i got back into my car. i looked directly ahead, into my windshield. i noticed another airplane leading off with another chemtrail. when i activated the camera function on my cellular phone again, and focused the lens through my windshield, i notice another round-shaped object,which was surrounded by pink light, and was moving across my lcd screen.  i jumped out of my car, because i wanted to video the bigger object.  the video that i recorded was 20 seconds long, and appears to show a ufo emitting some sort of energy charge to a chemtrail,which is displayed as a white horizontal line across the middle of the screen.  a bit of pink light appears in the upper left corner, but was obstructed.  
after what i had seen already, it never occurred to me keep taking pictures and videos.
content.summary: Moving objects were hovering near a chemtrail

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving north 15th ave nw and saw a traangle shape object with 4 lights hovering over the road.It was in a shape of a triangle with a light on each point and a light in the middle. the triangle edges were rounded, not a sharp point. the lights in each corner were off whit and circular in shape. the circular light in the center seemed brighter. it hovered over the road for over a minute. we pulled over and turned around to watch it stop hovering and travel sw towards west seattle. at first we thought it might be an airplane but ruled that out bc there were no flashing lights on it and it seemed way to low and far from the airport. then we thougt it might be a helicopter but as we got closer and then directly under it and realized that it wasn't a helicopter. i felt scared bc i couldn't find an explanation for what it could be. my friend was in aww and couldn't believe what we were seeing... we wanted to see more....But it began to move sw.
content.summary: My friend and i were driving down 15th ave nw and saw a traiangle shape object with 4 lights hovering over the road.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all, greetings from trujillo city, peru (i wrote you from their website, but for a hotmail server error, operation aborted). anyway, i am attending meetings organized by the rama (or rahma) mission, an ufo-mystic group initially created by the peruvian self- appointed contacted and ufo researcher sixto paz wells in the early 70s (a character you might already known), but "dissolved" years later by himself, he says, due to problems in forming several groups, but according to other serious reports, by dark money management  from outside, which created a problem for which the "dissolution" of the group was formed in more urgent action to get out of this quagmire. 
the main topic that brings me to contact with you is to solicit their opinions, "serious and responsible ditto previous study and analysis of course-about a picture quite rare and even" wonderful "to some, but that in me has raised serious doubts, since that picture was just at moments when the group had a drought of experience. it was taken by one of the "referent" group (coincidentally just for him) on a field trip in this city north of peru, who claimed that when he took the picture, there was nothing in the sky, but then, the disclose, oh, god, he found "such great surprise": there in the sky (seeing photo, next to the branches of a tree) something like a brillant big object  heart-shaped. the photo can be seen on the blog of the group: http://www.Rahmatrujillo.Blogspot.Com/(this photo is the second and sixth image in descending order to run the computer mouse. the latter-the larger-is most suitable for analysis ). also, note that the outer contour of such a heart is composed of two colors: violet and pink (left and right of the observer). in group meetings irradiation we often work with these colors, which, according to the teachings of saint germain-symbolizing the transmutation and love, respectively. after such a photograph to make public their ideological kin (coincidentally, only to them), tacitly self-styled "voices" of the group (with branches nationwide) "interpreted" for me-tal-course phenomenon as a "call" or "invocation" of the "guides aliens" for that emphasizes "in love", and through the purple transmute all karma and imbalance in our lives. i ask: could you seriously and scientifically analyze the photograph and then indicate whether or not fraudulent? or at least: could some body or person specializing in such research and corroboration or alleged paranormal phenomena revealed in photographs (i imagine that they are holders of special software used for this purpose) giving me any websites or links that seriously addressed this kind of research or emails so i can contact with any of them?. i believe in the ufo phenomenon but not everything that occurs as part of it ... and worse than it could be a hoax. today the picture is digitized and anyone with knowledge in computer systems can do and create "wonders". but one thing is to play innocently with these tools ... and another trick with narrow interests to the well-intentioned people. maybe also photography has not been faked. in this case, but i can not accept such evidence, because what is is. and if that be the other, also accept that what is not, never will be. i can not be clearer. 

thanking very mucho to you in advance for the service ...
content.summary: Heart-shaped brillant big object in photography previously not viewed: (see in: http://www.Rahmatrujillo.Blogspot.Com/ )

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking for the space station and i thought i had found it until it started flashing red, blue, green yellow white. i went inside to get a camera and when i got back outside there was about two more and the first was bigger and brighter and flashing faster. we looked at them for about 30 min and they hadn't moved at all.
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Egg,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Bright,and flashing fast

content.detailedDescription:
Relato avistamiento ovni
eran aproximadamente las 11 pm. de esa noche muy oscura y estrellada y sin luna. a causa del calor, estaba sentado  afuera en la vereda de mi casa, mirando hacia el norte. de pronto, de entre los ���rboles diviso una luz que se va acercando desde el norte, haciendo un movimiento norte-sur; esta luz se agranda y al llegar al cenit del cielo se detuvo casi perpendicular a mi cabeza, pero, a mucha altura y desplazada ligeramente hacia el este. el objeto o lo que fuere era circular y totalmente iluminado en su parte de abajo con una luz blanca, muy similar a las luces fosforescentes. estuvo detenido aproximadamente entre 2 y 3 segundos para luego comenzar a moverse hacia el este de modo ondulante, como si estuviera buscando un rumbo, un poco para atr���s y un poco para adelante, haciendo cortos y lentos desplazamientos, para luego regresar al punto en el cual estuvo brevemente detenido; se detiene nuevamente por 2 o 3 segundos y comienza a desplazarse hacia el norte; su primer movimiento fue lento, luego se dispara a una velocidad inveros���mil. mientras el objeto hacia todas estas maniobras, yo me hab���a levantado de mi asiento y me coloqu��� en medio de la calle; mirando siempre  para arriba y siguiendo los movimientos con mucha tranquilidad y lo ���ltimo que alcanc��� a ver  despu���s que se dispar��� a alt���sima velocidad fue un puntito de luz en la lejan���a que se esfum��� en un segundo. mientras dur��� este suceso no sent��� temor y  no tuve sensaci���n desagradable alguna, por el contrario, me sent���a muy contento de que al fin pude ver lo que siempre hab���a deseado ver. tampoco escuch��� absolutamente ruido alguno y no he visto se���ales de luces de colores.
este acontecimiento lo coment��� con poqu���simas personas, especialmente en el ���mbito familiar. lamento no haber tomado exactamente hora y d���a del suceso. despu���s, nunca m���s he visto otra cosa igual o similar. muchas veces hab���a escuchado y le���do sobre sucesos de avistamiento de ovnis, y nuca dud��� de la existencia de estos objetos. hay muchas personas (personal militar, cient���ficos, tripulantes de aeronaves, polic���as etc.) que han visto este tipo de objeto y de formas distintas, personas de las cuales no podemos dudar. s���lo me resta agregar que de entre todas las denuncias de avistamiento, algunas  son falsas y no cre���bles; y no s���  qu��� intenciones persiguen tomando esta actitud.  

coordenadas desde donde se hizo la observaci���n: 31��� 45��� 00���  sur y 61��� 50��� 0��� oeste.

fin del relato.
content.summary: Objeto circular totalmente iluminado abajo, luz blanca tipo fluorescente.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of november 23/2009 i watched 2 giant, long 'cigar' shape vessels hovering dead steady high up in the sky.  i had to look straight up to see them.  i stood for 2 hours in the parking lot watching them.  

they were at very high altitude, much higher than cloud level but at times would get brighter and larger then fade back at other moments.  my best guess is these craft are at least the size of a football field each.

they appeared blurred out (cloaked) but the pale glow made them noticeable.  we have rotating spotlights in the falls here, and when the light would pass over and graze the one ship, it reflected back a very bright icy-blue flash much stronger than the spotlight.

a distinct formation was noticeable.  they stayed at fixed angles to one another, if you could think of the marks of a clock, they were roughly 12 o'clock and 2 o'clock respectively.

please contact me with any questions!  i just hope all of these witnesses with all these photos and videos are taken seriously because quite frankly i just want to know whats going on in our sky.  youtube is where most video and photos of sightings are being posted, i encourage you to investigate this.

thankyou so much!


louis

ps the sightings have been going on since october and are still being seen on various days!
content.summary: 2 hour sighting of 2 cloaked massive glowing vessels

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these two orangish-yellow orbs over lenoir, nc, three times over the past few weeks.  the first time was in the car with my grandfather.  he saw them too.  it was strange, but i didn't think too much about them.  the second time was on november 28.  i was in the car with my sister and her husband.  a few hours later i saw a helicopter heading in the same direction where we saw them last.  the last time was on december 7, which was the strangest sighting.  i was with my sister, and we went outside with her dog and saw one of the orbs moving very quickly across the sky.  then we watched it disappear, and reappear again a little farther away.  all three nights were clear, and they all happened around the same time, approximately 8pm.  a little while later we went back outside and saw another orb in the same spot, but it didn't move, and we could see the other one across this big field.  the one that didn't move did the disappear, reappear thing too.  either these orbs are pretty close or pretty big.  we couldn't hear anything unusual though.  another strange thing we saw on that same night of december 7 was a red light that flickered.  it was in the same part of the sky as the unmoving orb.  it moved back and forth in a swaying motion, and then it too disappeared.  my sister has saw a red light moving quickly across the sky in the same area too, and she heard a helicopter shortly after.  it's all been in the same area at the same time, except for on november 25, we saw something during the day, but in the exact same spot.  four children also witnessed it with us.  it was faint, kind of grayish in color.  it didn't appear to be round, and we also watched this one vanish.  there was a helicopter closeby.  also, for about a year, there's been this bright, star-like object that we can't explain.  it almost looks like a planet but we don't know if that's a possibility.  plus, for about the same amount of time, we've been seeing these little, blinking lights pop up all over the sky.  they look triangular, with a white light on the top point and two red lights for the base points.  they don't move, so they can't be planes and i don't think they could be satellites.  it's all just strange and kind of discomforting because i've lived here my whole life and never seen anything like any of it before.  i'm very interested in this kind of thing, but i find this almost frightening.  we were shaking when we saw the orange orbs vanish right in front of us.  this is such a small, rural town.  the closest airport is half an hour away and there aren't any military bases nearby.  the objects were mostly in the northwest, and if they moved they were headed southeast.  i'm just not sure what to think of it...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two yellow- orange orbs over lenoir, nc. seen three different nights. one always moves and the other doesn't. they disappear and reappear.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 2 friends were out riding around on some back roads here in manchester. we are coming up on their house when i notice a "star" move. i pull into one of his neighbors driveways and cut off my headlights. being as this isn't the first time ive ever seen weird things in the sky i immediately hang myself out the window to get a panorama of the clear night sky. we start watching all the stars more closely and pretty soon they are all switching positions and forming constellations (there were 2 orions, 2 big dippers) then they fall out of those shapes and start taking the triangle and diamond shapes i'm familiar with. we watched in awe for the next hour while the entire sky filled up with these unfathomably large crafts. at some point in all this a craft became upright and was in the shape of a pyramid, with a smaller inverted pyramid at the bottom. all during this time there were single "stars" (individually manned crafts)moving in all parts of the sky. we drive around and get a different angle on the huge pyramid and we see these single "stars" coming out of ports on the inclines of the craft (we can see recessed lights in the ports). we drove around all night getting different vantage points, on multiple occasions they responded to being "bright lighted", they would actually flash back.
content.summary: The single most miraculous thing that i have ever witnessed

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i5 about 8:30 pm on august 12 2009. i was almost to brooks ore. when i saw a really bright light, not blinking, heading south, parallel to i5. it looked like it was over the pilot fueling station in brooks ore. the reason it caught my attention, was because of how low the object was flying above the ground. so, i figured it was a helicopter flying at a low altitude to inspect, or look at something. as i got closer, it flew over i5 and it was further away than i thought. as it flew over i5 i got a look at the bottom and saw three bright white lights in a triangle formation, with a small non blinking red light somewhere on the bottom. after flying over the interstate, the object hovered behind some thin trees at the norpac cannery in what i think is a cabbage patch. from the side it looked like a jet with no wings. i was baffled. i know for sure that there was no propeller. i passed the object at the norpac plant on i5, it was approx. 90-110 feet above the ground and going maybe 20-30 mph. i got a pretty good look at it. it was dusk, but i could see that it did not have any wings or propeller, and no blinking lights. it looked like it was matte silver or gray. i remember seeing a car pulled over on the side of the interstate. i dont know if it was related. i told a couple of close friends and family, and they all thought i was seeing a helicopter or a small plane. i drive that section of freeway alot, and commuted to woodburn ore. from salem ore. for a year on graveyard shift. it took along time to say or tell anybody about it, because of ridicule. i still think about this event almost everyday. what ever this craft was, man made or not, ive never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Three bright white lights one small red one. stream line exterior.

content.detailedDescription: I'm commenting here after searching the internet after a blue-light phenomenon happened to me at about 8:30 this evening. i was on my out to pick up my girlfriend from work and there was a blizzard happening. i was driving very slowly at about 5 mph and a strange blue light appeared right over my car. i could not explain this light by anything other than a light-blue lightning bolt. it flashed above me and in around my car for about 8 seconds. there was no sound at all. the flashing was very chaotic. i instantly thought that there was something falling out of the sky and was headed directly at me. i stopped the car and actually prepared for an impact of what i quickly thought was either lightning or a crashing plane's light. i thought the latter because i live very close to an airport. as suddenly as the light appeared it had disappeared. i was fortunate enough to have a car about a tenth of a mile facing my direction at the time this happened. i drove up to the street and got out of my car to ask the other driver if he saw anything. the man in the other car said that a saw a very bright flashing light above my car. i asked if he saw the source and he said no. i asked if it was a plane and he said it couldn't have been because it was too low. i also asked if the light appeared as a beam coming down and he said that he just couldn't  describe it. this really frustrated me because of his distance would have given him a much better perspective of the event. it was difficult for him to truly describe the source of the light because of the poor visibility through the blowing snow. he also seemed confused and freaked out by the event and didn't seem willing to continue the conversation. he did ask me jokingly if i had though it was a dream i was having. i simply said yes. he said that i shouldn't worry because he saw it too. i walked away from him saying "[cms/tg/pd]" over and over again. i was freaked out! the light seemed electric. i cant really describe it any other way. it was as if there was a ball of blue electricity right above my car. the event happened at [cms/tg/pid]. if you are to google map this address the red pointer will fall on the exact place where the event took place.
content.summary: Strange blue light flashes above my car!

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed three orb-like objects in the sky during july over santa rosa, california.

as i was walking downtown that evening, sometime between 7:45 and 8:15 on what i believe was july 8th, i looked up into the sky, as it was a rather clear evening. i was located between brookwood and e street in a small one block residential strip before the downtown area, headed west. i was struck immediately by the color of three spherical lights traveling in a triangular formation in the sky headed east. the lights were of a luminous orange-red color and seemed to be flickering, as from the inside, with a yellowish tinge. it is best described as a flicker, as the lights did not blink; there was absolutely no blinking involved. primarily i likened the lights/orbs to red balloons with a candle in the center.

upon seeing the lights, i froze to observe them, as they continued to fly in formation to the east. before passing over me, i was surprised as the two rear lights, which essentially formed the "base" of the isosceles triangle formation, peeled off showing independent movement not only from the leading object of the formation, but also from one another in the process, and they began heading toward the north. i continued to focus on the two northern bound lights as they continued in that direction and seemed to ascend until completely out of sight. it was then, that i turned my attention back to the other orb/light, as it continued eastward bound. by this time, it had passed over my position, and i had turned my body toward the east in order to observe it. it continued east, made a slight deviation toward the north, and it too ascended into the sky until out of view.

this event lasted 40 seconds at the most. it was absolutely silent all of the while.

the orbs were extremely luminous and they were very visible in the night sky. they appeared as striking as jupiter (this season) in the night sky in contrast with the other celestial objects. the orbs had a depth-like quality to them, which is why i use the word luminous.

there are many reasons why the lights cannot be explained. i am extremely used to helicopters in the area, as memorial hospital, which was less than a 1/4 of a mile to the east of the event, is where the life-alert helicopters fly patients in. i do not live far from the hospital, and so i am familiar with what they look like in the night sky, what they sound like, and how low they are in altitude as they are landing at the hospital. they were not helicopters.

in addition, i am also familiar with leer jets and other small planes that are seen over santa rosa's skies, although not often. i was able to see that the orbs were not on aircraft, but were airborne themselves, and they did not appear to behave like or look like anything i have ever seen before or since.

i was armed with an unsophisticated cellphone camera, but i did not take a picture, as i was entranced by the lights themselves, fearful that if i looked away they'd be gone, and i also knew from previous experience that when taking a night picture with my phone of the sky, that streetlights wash out the image.

after the event, i phoned home and spoke with my mother to inform her of what i had just seen. i explained to her the odd qualities of the flicker as opposed to any constant or blinking light source. i since have done a bit of research of the orbs, and i am confident as to what i saw was an unidentified flying object.

i feel that it is important that i report this event to allow it to be logged and correlate with other possible events that may have or might be occurring in the area.
content.summary: Three luminescent orbs seen flying an a triangular formation with independent movement, which break formation, two heading north, one heading east, and ascending until indistinguishable.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching this show and at this particular time at 20 min into the show, they were showing a astrounaut in the shuttle and a streack passed in the the windo above her or him.
content.summary: Discovery  ch-end of the universe\hubble\20 min into the show
